title: EU Gets Tough On Hate Speech: Big Tech Faces Fire | Hot Mic with Nidhi Razdan - NDTV
content: EU Gets Tough On Hate Speech: Big Tech Faces Fire | Hot Mic with Nidhi Razdan  NDTV
description: Last week, the European Union reached an agreement on a landmark legislation which will force big tech firms like Google and Meta and others to combat disinformation and hate speech more aggressively on their platforms.
